```{r setup, include=FALSE}
if (!require("pacman")) install.packages("pacman")
pacman::p_load(readxl, dplyr, stringr)
```

```{r}
files <- list.files("data/", pattern = "^CO_Child_Rates.*\\.xlsx$", full.names = TRUE)

all_data <- files |>
  lapply(read_excel) |>
  bind_rows()

write_csv(all_data, "data/combined_CO_Child_Rates.csv")
```
